short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Katai is a simple tool to help you convert the different type of Japanese characters.
short.ja: Kataiは、異なる種類の日本語文字を変換するのに役立つシンプルなツールです
short.zh_CN: Katai 是一个简单的工具，帮助你转换不同类型的日文字符。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Katai is a versatile Chrome extension designed to assist with Japanese character conversions. With a simple right-click, you can effortlessly convert between different Japanese character types. The tool supports conversions from Katakana to Hiragana, Hiragana to Katakana, and half-width characters to full-width characters. This makes it an invaluable tool for students, translators, and anyone working with Japanese text. With Katai, managing Japanese character conversions becomes a breeze."
